Kim Chi Fried Rice

Kimchi fried rice is a Korean dish made by stir-frying cooked rice with kimchi, vegetables, and
meat or seafood. The fermented tang of the kimchi, combined with the umami flavors of the
other ingredients, creates a deliciously savory and spicy meal.

Ingredients

  • - 3 Cups Day Old Rice
  • - 4 Tablespoons KimChi Juice
  • - 2 Tablespoon Soy Sauce
  • - 1 Tablespoon Siracha
  • - 1 Tablespoon Sugar
  • - 2 Tablespoon Canola Oil
  • - 2 Garlic Cloves (minced)
  • - 1 Small Onion (diced)
  • - 1 pc. Carrot (julienned)
  • - 3/4 cup luncheon meat or bacon (diced)
  • - 3/4 Cup Kim Chi Coarsely chopped, juices set aside
  • - Handful of Bean Sprouts
  • - 1 Tablespoon Sesame Oil

Optional Garnishes

  • - 4 Fried Eggs
  • - 1/4 Cup nori, strips
  • - 2 Green Onions
  • - Toasted Sesame Seeds
